title: Terms of Service
subtitle: Terms governing the use of our services.

content.title: Acceptance of Terms
paragraphs: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
If you do not agree to abide by these terms, please do not use this site or our services.

content.title: Service Description
paragraphs: Zoon.ai provides AI and software development services as described on our website. Specific terms for each project are outlined in separate service agreements.
We reserve the right to modify or discontinue any service at any time without prior notice.

content.title: Intellectual Property
paragraphs: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of Zoon.ai and is protected by intellectual property laws.
Client deliverables are subject to the terms outlined in individual project agreements.

content.title: Limitation of Liability
paragraphs: Zoon.ai shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of or inability to use the services.
Our total liability in any matter arising out of or in connection with this agreement is limited to the amount paid by you for the services.
